title: Mecha Zero Sion's VO is... Humorous?! I like it!

embed.description: This is the voice for the new Legendary Skin Mecha Zero Sion in English. Note: The Voice might not be final, you never know what tweaks Riot might make to it.

body:
Color me surprised; while definitely not a "joke" skin, there's a lot of humor and silliness in this VO, and i count at least 2 Arnold movie references in the first couple minutes. 

Project Yi captured the MGS: Revengeance melodrama, but i'm glad that for Sion they went more for the "80s Decepticon" portrayal. I like the small amount of silliness, and the overall lighter tone of the skin :)

And let's be honest, he's kinda adorable when he choo-choos into his ult.

Edit: Check out the Illoai taunt at around 8 minutes in; it had me rolling XD
